venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's in Auburn on Thursday nights. An emcee reads questions in various categories and team members submit answers, bidding a certain number of points each time. The team with the most points in the ends, wins.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have small meetup sign. Plus I will give out my cell number closer to the event.
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's in Auburn
